definitions.definition: An antiviral drug that is taken orally in the form of its phosphate C 16 H 28 N 2 O 4 ·H 3 PO 4 and is a neuraminidase inhibitor used in the treatment and prevention of influenza . It is a derivative of shikimic acid , and is marketed as Tamiflu .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) An antiviral drug that is taken orally in the form of its phosphate C 16 H 28 N 2 O 4 ·H 3 PO 4 and is a neuraminidase inhibitor used in the treatment and prevention of influenza . It is a derivative of shikimic acid , and is marketed as Tamiflu .
